description: This week, Tommy has decided to bring back Ruby to have some straight fun.</br></br>If you remember, Tommy hasn't hookup up with Ruby on camera for quite some time.</br></br>This isn't your basic sex scene though, as the pair gets a visitor halfway through their fun. Tommy even lets Ruby give Caleb a stroke and a suck, before being called back to the bed for some more pounding.</br></br>Tommy impresses with one of the best facials he's ever given a partner. title: Tommy D In A Treesome
